alert.note: Alert for Animas River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 30 at 5:14PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Archuleta, southern Hinsdale and east central La Plata Counties through 545 PM MDT... At 514 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms 13 miles northeast of Bayfield, or 24 miles east of Durango, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Archuleta, southern Hinsdale and east central La Plata Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
